item.title: UCB CS 61A Notes
item.description: This post is the notes I took while learning CS 61A (Spring 2022).

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, this is ikitsu, an undergraduate student studying computer science at Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST) and currently a member of Unique Studio Lab and Heptagon HPC Team. I’m a self-motivated programmer just coding for interest and a freshman working hard to learn the basics of computer science. Confusing about whether to be an engineer or a researcher in the future, I still have a long way to go.
